_4t62i_OUZ8#1#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1s: Yes program or harp provide streamline refinance sing to low or no equity mortgages if the borrower and meet certain qualifications and if their existing mortgages are already guaranteed by Fannie Mae or Freddie Mac
